review.title: Review prescriptions
review.heading: Review your prescriptions
review.subheading: Please review the prescriptions before you select a pharmacy. Reach out to your provider for any issues.

pharmacy.title: Select a pharmacy
pharmacy.heading: Select a pharmacy
pharmacy.subheading: We'll send your prescriptions to your selected pharmacy to be filled.

modal.heading: Set location
modal.subheading: Enter the zipcode or address where you'd like to search for a pharmacy.

pickup.heading: Pick Up
pickup.subheading: Your prescriptions at a nearby location.

status.title: Filling your prescriptions
status.heading: Filling your prescriptions
status.subheading: After your prescriptions are sent to a pharmacy, we'll send you updates on their status.

chat.prompt: At the pharmacy? Let us know if you're having any issues.

SENT.title: Sent to Pharmacy
SENT.description: Your prescription fills have been sent to the pharmacy.

RECEIVED.title: Received
RECEIVED.description: The pharmacy has received your order and is preparing to fill it.

READY.title: Ready for Pick Up
READY.description: Your prescriptions are ready to be picked up.

PICKED_UP.title: Picked Up
PICKED_UP.description: Please notify us below when you've picked up your prescriptions.

errorToast.title: Unable to mark order as picked up

SENT.title: Sent to Pharmacy
SENT.description: Your prescription fills have been sent to the pharmacy.

FILLING.title: Filling your prescriptions
FILLING.description: The pharmacy has received your order and is filling it.

DELIVERING.title: Delivering
DELIVERING.description: Your prescriptions are being delivered to

DELIVERED.title: Delivered
DELIVERED.description: Your prescriptions have arrived at their destination.

errorToast.title: Unable to mark order as delivered
